formatDescription: File created every time a user sets up a session in Pro Tools, music creation software made by Avid, which allows the user to create, record and mix music. Every time a session is started, a ptx file is created, containing all plug ins, audio and midi tracks and mixer settings. They do not contain actual audio, but have audio files linked to them.
provenanceCompoundName: National Library of New Zealand / National Library of New Zealand
formatProvenance: 04/2024 (v.118)- Version number changed from 10 onwards to 10+ and signature name updated to include version number 10+. Submitted by Preservica.

internalSignatures.name: Pro Tools Session File 10+
